name: Spellspace
tag_list: social, tarot, spells, divination, community, tarot-cards
overview:
In the Internet, over 35 million people in North America* actively seek psychics. This extraordinary demand has been neglected until now. SpellSpace is the only interactive tarot site on the Internet. Chat with members doing amazingly accurate real-time readings that can be saved and reviewed as intuitive trend charts. View other membersâ€™ psychic profiles, complete with horoscope, birthday tarot significance, last reading and personal greeting. If members like what they see, they can invite them as friends to join their Tarot RoomÂ®. Each reading reveals elegant personalized spell recommendation from the SpellStore to enhance love, work situation, or even luck, along with hundreds of other magical potions and products. SpellSpace combines cutting-edge technology with elegance, beauty and true psychic power to unleash the ancient art of tarot for all.
SpellSpace is available in both English and Spanish, increasing the interested audience to over 60 million worldwide.

*source: Bayler Institute Studies of Religion survey overall 13% of Americans seek Psychics.
